wài

item.Q:

item.A:
traditional: 備
bèi

lǐ

gē

zhì
智慧 zhìhuì wisdom; knowledge

item.Q:
Write the character: mèi
(mèimei de mèi)
item.A:
younger sister
妹妹 mèimei younger sister

traditional: 抱養
bàoyǎng adopt (a child)
bàba (informal) father

traditional: 媽媽
māma mama; mommy; mother
dìdi younger brother
gēge older brother
mèimei younger sister
jiějie older sister
nǎinai (informal) father's mother; paternal grandmother

traditional: 爺爺
yéye (informal) father's father; paternal grandfather
wàigōng (informal) mother's father; maternal grandfather
zǔfù father's father; paternal grandfather
wàizǔfù maternal grandfather (i.e. mother's father)

traditional: 嬸母
shěnmǔ wife of father's younger brother; aunt
jiùfù mother's brother; maternal uncle

traditional: 姑媽
gūmā (coll.) father's married sister; paternal aunt
